bibdata.title: Draft Standard for Qualification of Equipment Used in Nuclear Facilities
Draft Standard for Qualification of Equipment Used in Nuclear Facilities
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P627/D3c, October 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides guidance on basic 1 qualification principles and appropriate methods of demonstrating the qualification of equipment used in nuclear facilities. The principles, methods, and procedures described are intended to be used for qualifying equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
